channel.title: CVE Feed for StarCitizenTools -- mediawiki-extensions-ShortDescription
channel.description: The latest CVEs for StarCitizenTools -- mediawiki-extensions-ShortDescription

item.title: CVE-2022-21710|2024-08-03T02:53:35.497Z -- starcitizentools -- mediawiki-extensions-shortdescription
item.description: ShortDescription is a MediaWiki extension that provides local short description support. A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in versions prior to 2.3.4. On a wiki that has the ShortDescription enabled, XSS can be triggered on any page or the page with the action=info parameter, which displays the shortdesc property. This is achieved using the wikitext `{{SHORTDESC:<img src=x onerror=alert()>}}`. This issue has a patch in version 2.3.4.
